task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:smooth_sandstone facing:A shape:rectangle corners:[[-14 -60 1] [-8 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:smooth_sandstone facing:A shape:rectangle corners:[[-10 -60 -2] [-8 -60 0]]]"
]

5. **Continue with the Blueprint**: After placing the second block, agent2 should review the blueprint to ensure all blocks are placed correctly and in the right order.

6. **Coordinate with Team**: Throughout the process, agent2 should communicate with agent1 and agent3 to ensure that everyone is aware of the progress and to request assistance if needed.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-9 -60 -3] end:[-9 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:dirt facing:A positions:[[-9 -60 -4] [-8 -60 0] [-9 -60 4]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-10 -60 -4] end:[-10 -60 4]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-8 -60 -4] [-8 -60 -3] [-8 -60 -2] [-8 -60 -1] [-8 -60 1] [-8 -60 2] [-8 -60 3] [-8 -60 4]]]"
]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-9 -60 -3] end:[-9 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:dirt facing:A positions:[[-9 -60 -4] [-8 -60 0] [-9 -60 4]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-10 -60 -4] end:[-10 -60 4]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-8 -60 -4] [-8 -60 -3] [-8 -60 -2] [-8 -60 -1] [-8 -60 1] [-8 -60 2] [-8 -60 3] [-8 -60 4]]]"
]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-11 -60 -3] end:[-11 -60 5]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 -5] [-8 -60 -5] [-10 -60 -4] [-9 -60 -4] [-8 -60 -4] [-10 -60 -3] [-9 -60 -3] [-10 -60 -2] [-10 -60 -1] [-10 -60 0] [-10 -60 1] [-13 -60 5]]]",

    "[material:dirt facing:A positions:[[-9 -60 -5] [-12 -60 5]]]"
]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:purpur_block facing:A positions:[start:[-12 -60 1] end:[-9 -60 1] start:[-12 -59 1] end:[-8 -59 1] start:[-12 -58 1] end:[-8 -58 1] start:[-12 -57 1] end:[-8 -57 1] start:[-12 -56 1] end:[-8 -56 1]]]",
    "material: purpur_pillar facing: z position: [-10, -60, 0]",

]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:bone_block facing:x positions:[start:[-10 -60 0] end:[-9 -60 1]]]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:coal_ore facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 0] [-9 -60 0] [-10 -60 1] [-9 -60 1]]]",
    "material: coal_ore facing: A position: [-11, -60, -1]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-9 -60 -4] end:[-9 -60 4]]]",
    "material: dirt facing: A position: [-8, -60, 0]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 0] [-8 -60 1] [-10 -60 2] [-10 -60 3] [-10 -60 4] [-9 -60 4] [-10 -60 5]]]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:purpur_pillar facing:z positions:[start:[-10 -60 -1] end:[-10 -60 2]]]",
    "[material:purpur_stairs positions:[position:[-11 -60 -1] facing:E position:[-9 -60 -1] facing:W position:[-12 -59 -1] facing:E position:[-8 -59 -1] facing:W]]",
    "[material:purpur_block facing:A positions:[start:[-12 -59 0] end:[-8 -59 0]]]",

    "[material:purpur_block facing:A positions:[start:[-11 -59 -1] end:[-9 -59 -1]]]",

    "[material:purpur_stairs facing:W positions:[[-8 -58 0] [-8 -58 1] [-8 -58 2]]]",
    "material: purpur_block facing: A position: [-12, -58, -1]",
    "material: purpur_block facing: A position: [-8, -58, -1]"
]

2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:pumpkin facing:A positions:[[-9 -60 -2] [-10 -60 -1] [-9 -60 -1] [-9 -59 -1]]]",
    "[material:dark_oak_fence facing:A positions:[[-8 -60 -2] [-8 -60 0] [-8 -60 2] [-8 -59 0] [-8 -58 0]]]",
    "[material:dark_oak_fence facing:A positions:[[-11 -60 -2] [-11 -60 0] [-11 -60 2] [-11 -59 0] [-11 -58 0]]]",
    "material: crafting_table facing: A position: [-9, -60, 1]",

*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.

Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:bone_block facing:y positions:[[-10 -60 -5] [-10 -60 -3] [-10 -60 -1] [-10 -60 1] [-10 -60 3] [-10 -60 5]]]",
    "[material:bone_block facing:y positions:[[-8 -60 -5] [-8 -60 -3] [-8 -60 -1] [-8 -60 1] [-8 -60 3] [-8 -60 5]]]",
    "[material:bone_block facing:y positions:[[-10 -59 -5] [-10 -59 -3] [-10 -59 -1] [-10 -59 1] [-10 -59 3] [-10 -59 5]]]",
    "[material:bone_block facing:y positions:[start:[-8 -59 -5] end:[-8 -59 5]]]",
    "[material:bone_block facing:z positions:[start:[-9 -58 -6] end:[-9 -58 6]]]"
]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:coal_ore facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 -5] [-10 -60 -3] [-10 -60 -1] [-10 -60 1] [-10 -60 3] [-10 -60 5]]]",
    "[material:coal_ore facing:A positions:[[-8 -60 -5] [-8 -60 -3] [-8 -60 -1] [-8 -60 1] [-8 -60 3] [-8 -60 5]]]",
    "[material:coal_ore facing:A positions:[[-10 -59 -5] [-10 -59 -3] [-10 -59 -1] [-10 -59 1] [-10 -59 3] [-10 -59 5]]]",
    "[material:coal_ore facing:A positions:[[-8 -59 -5] [-8 -59 -3] [-8 -59 -1] [-8 -59 1] [-8 -59 3] [-8 -59 5]]]",
    "[material:coal_ore facing:A positions:[start:[-9 -58 -6] end:[-9 -58 6]]]"
]

", "session_id": "### Summary of Chat History and Task Assignments

**Context:**
The conversation involves two agents, Agent1 and Agent2, collaborating on a project that requires the placement of coal ore blocks at specified coordinates. Agent1 is responsible for placing the blocks, while Agent2 provides guidance and support.

**Key Points:**
1. **Coal Ore Discovery**: Agent2 informs Agent1 about the discovery of coal ore at coordinates [-10, -60, 1].
2. **Block Placement**: Agent1 successfully places several coal ore blocks but runs out of coal ore while attempting to place another block at [-10, -59, 5]. They request confirmation to retrieve more coal ore from the chest at the same coordinates.
3. **Instructions for Retrieval and Placement**: Agent2 confirms that Agent1 should continue retrieving coal ore from the chest and provides a detailed order for subsequent block placements.
4. **Reiteration of Tasks**: The instructions for retrieving coal ore and placing blocks are reiterated multiple times, emphasizing the importance of following the specified order.

**Next Tasks for Agent2:**
1. **Monitor Agent1's Progress**: Keep track of Agent1 as they retrieve coal ore and place blocks, offering assistance if needed.
2. **Encourage Retrieval**: Confirm with Agent1 that they are retrieving coal ore from [-10, -60, 1] and remind them of the block placement order.
3. **Check in with Agent3**: Follow up with Agent3 regarding any coal ore they may have gathered from the chest at coordinates [-4, -60, 0] and coordinate delivery to Agent1 if applicable.
4. **Plan for Auxiliary Blocks**: Stay alert for future placements that may require auxiliary blocks and consider their design and placement.
5. **Review Inventory and Resources**: After Agent1 completes the block placements, check the inventory for remaining coal ore or other materials needed for upcoming tasks.
6. **Prepare for Next Steps**: Begin planning the next phase of the building process according to the blueprint, identifying materials and positions for future placements.
7. **Encourage Team Collaboration**: Foster open communication among all agents to ensure clarity in roles and responsibilities as the project progresses.

**Conclusion:**
By focusing on these tasks, Agent2 can effectively support Agent1 in the ongoing project, ensuring a smooth and efficient building process. The collaboration highlights the importance of communication and coordination among agents to achieve their objectives."}

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt facing:A position:[-9 -60 1] material:cobblestone_stairs facing:N position:[-9 -59 1]]",
    "[material:dirt facing:A position:[-9 -60 -1] material:cobblestone_stairs facing:S position:[-9 -59 -1]]",
    "material: glowstone facing: A position: [-9, -60, 0]",
    "material: dirt facing: A position: [-8, -60, 0]",
    "material: dirt facing: A position: [-10, -60, 0]",
    "material: grass_block facing: A position: [-8, -60, 1]",
    "material: grass_block facing: A position: [-8, -60, -1]",
    "material: grass_block facing: A position: [-10, -60, 1]",
    "material: grass_block facing: A position: [-10, -60, -1]",
    "[material:black_wool facing:A positions:[[-9 -59 0] [-9 -58 0] [-9 -56 0]] material:furnace facing:N position:[-9 -54 0]]",
    "[material:cobblestone_stairs facing:W positions:[[-8 -59 0] [-8 -53 0] [-8 -51 0]] material:stone_button facing:E position:[-8 -55 0]]",
    "[material:cobblestone_stairs facing:E positions:[[-10 -59 0] [-10 -53 0] [-10 -51 0]]]",
    "material: dead_bush facing: A position: [-8, -59, 1]",
    "[material:jungle_log facing:y positions:[start:[-9 -57 0] end:[-9 -55 0]]]",
    "material: stone_button facing: S position: [-9, -55, 1]",
    "material: stone_button facing: N position: [-9, -55, -1]",
    "material: stone_button facing: W position: [-10, -55, 0]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:smooth_sandstone facing:A shape:rectangle corners:[[-15 -60 -1] [-9 -60 -1] [-15 -60 1] [-9 -60 1]] missing:[[-11 -60 0] [-12 -60 0]] material:smooth_sandstone facing:A position:[-8 -60 2]]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:sand facing:A positions:[start:[-11 -60 -1] end:[-11 -60 3]]]",
    "material: structure_block facing: A position: [-10, -60, 0]",
